languages.text: "Впрочем, для этого будет свое время. Как бы я ни хотел поиграть с вами, с одним за другим по очереди, ты, Вольный Торговец, нуж{mf|ен|на} мне для дела. Тебя — вас всех — ждет Комморра. Мандрагоры, тащите их. Всех до единого".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем, для этого будет свое время. Как бы я не хотел поиграть с вами, с одним за другим по очереди, ты, Вольный Торговец, нужен мне для дела. Тебя — вас всех — ждет Комморра. Мандрагоры, тащите их. Всех до единого".
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you, all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, для этого будет свое время. Как бы я ни хотел поиграть с вами, с одним за другим по очереди, ты, Вольный Торговец, нуж{mf|ен|на} мне для дела. Тебя — вас всех — ждет Комморра. Мандрагоры, тащите их. Всех до единого".

traits.locale_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you — all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you — all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you, all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you, all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you, all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you, all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: « Qu'importe, nous aurons le temps d'y revenir. Même si je brûle de jouer avec vous tous l'un après l'autre, j'ai besoin de vous dans un but précis, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Vous êtes tous attendus à Commorragh. Mandragores, emmenez-les ! Ne laissez personne derrière vous. »
languages.original_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you, all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'importe, nous aurons le temps d'y revenir. Même si je brûle de jouer avec vous tous l'un après l'autre, j'ai besoin de vous dans un but précis, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Vous êtes tous attendus à Commorragh. Mandragores, emmenez-les ! Ne laissez personne derrière vous. »
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: “不过，这件事情可以以后再说。虽然我很想陪你们每个人都好好玩玩，但我和你还有事情要办，行商浪人。科摩罗在等着你呢，等着你们所有人。曼德拉，把这些人带走，一个都不要留下。”
languages.original_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you, all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."

traits.locale_text: “不过，这件事情可以以后再说。虽然我很想陪你们每个人都好好玩玩，但我和你还有事情要办，行商浪人。科摩罗在等着你呢，等着你们所有人。曼德拉，把这些人带走，一个都不要留下。”
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: 「だが、その時間はあとだ。お前たち全員と遊んでやりたいのは山々だが、目的を果たすためにお前たちが必要なのだ、自由開拓者よ。コモラフがお前たちを待っている。マンドレイク、全員を連れて行け。 一人も残すな」
languages.original_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you, all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、その時間はあとだ。お前たち全員と遊んでやりたいのは山々だが、目的を果たすためにお前たちが必要なのだ、自由開拓者よ。コモラフがお前たちを待っている。マンドレイク、全員を連れて行け。 一人も残すな」
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Wie auch immer, dafür ist später auch noch Zeit. Auch wenn ich am liebsten mit jedem von Euch spielen will, ich brauche Euch für eine bestimmte Sache, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Commorragh erwartet Euch, jeden von Euch. Mandraks, schafft sie weg. Lasst keinen zurück."
languages.original_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you, all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."

traits.locale_text: "Wie auch immer, dafür ist später auch noch Zeit. Auch wenn ich am liebsten mit jedem von Euch spielen will, ich brauche Euch für eine bestimmte Sache, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Commorragh erwartet Euch, jeden von Euch. Mandraks, schafft sie weg. Lasst keinen zurück."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: «Pero ya habrá tiempo después para eso. Jugaré con todos vosotros, uno tras otro; aunque a ti te necesito para algo concreto, Comerciante Independiente. Commorragh os está esperando. Mandrágoras, lleváoslos. No os dejéis a nadie».
languages.original_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you, all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."

traits.locale_text: «Pero ya habrá tiempo después para eso. Jugaré con todos vosotros, uno tras otro; aunque a ti te necesito para algo concreto, Comerciante Independiente. Commorragh os está esperando. Mandrágoras, lleváoslos. No os dejéis a nadie».
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Zevkine doymaya daha sonra vaktimiz olacak. Hepinizle peş peşe oyunlar oynamak istesem de bir iş için bana lazımsınız Hür Tacir. Commorragh sizi bekler. Kankurutanlar, alın şunları. Commorragh yolcusu kalmasın."
languages.original_text: "However, there will be time for that later. No matter how I wish to play with you all one after another, I need you for a purpose, Rogue Trader. Commorragh awaits you, all of you. Mandrakes, take them. Leave none behind."

traits.locale_text: "Neyse, buna daha sonra vaktimiz olacak. Hepinizle peş peşe oyunlar oynamak istesem de, bir iş için bana lazımsınız Hür Tacir. Commorragh sizi bekler. Kankurutanlar, alın şunları. Commorragh yolcusu kalmasın."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai
